Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Enter valid username 'standard_user' 3. Enter valid password 'secret_sauce' 4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should be logged in and redirected to the products page

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Enter invalid username 'incorrect_user' 3. Enter valid password 'secret_sauce' 4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should see an error message indicating invalid login credentials

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Enter valid username 'standard_user' 3. Enter invalid password 'wrong_password' 4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should see an error message indicating invalid login credentials

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Leave the username field empty 3. Enter valid password 'secret_sauce' 4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should see an error message indicating that username is required

Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/ 2. Enter valid username 'standard_user' 3. Leave the password field empty 4. Click on login button
Expected Result: User should see an error message indicating that password is required
